audio_processing.spoken_content: Traditional healers describe aloe as the burn plant - fresh gel applied directly to minor burns and cuts
audio_processing.cultural_context: Traditional oral knowledge about Aloe Vera

visual_processing.preparation_methods: Thick succulent leaves split lengthwise to reveal clear healing gel

audio_processing.spoken_content: Chamomile tea brewing creates apple-like fragrance, traditionally used for evening relaxation

knowledge_graph.preparation_methods: Dried flowers steeped in hot water for 5-10 minutes
